description: Main entry point and core UI components of a Flutter-based finance tracking app, including authentication, dashboard, transactions, budgets, and charts screens.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up dark theme and navigation structure.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Manages route to login/register or main app based on auth state.

classes.name: _AuthNavigationState
classes.description: Stateful logic for auth check, switching login/register, logout.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app shell with bottom navigation for dashboard, transactions, budgets, and charts.

classes.name: _MainScaffoldState
classes.description: State management for bottom navigation and current displayed screen.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Login UI component with email and password fields.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State management for login process, validation, and navigation.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: Registration UI component with email, password, confirm password.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State management for registration process and validation.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions and access to transaction creation.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: Handles fetching and displaying recent transactions, navigation to add/edit.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Shows list of transactions with delete and edit options.

classes.name: _TransactionsScreenState
classes.description: Manages fetching, deleting, and navigation for transactions.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Create or update transaction form with date picker and validation.

classes.name: _TransactionEditScreenState
classes.description: Handles form state, validation, save/update logic.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Displays categorized budget limits and spent amounts.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Displays spending analytics using pie charts.

classes.name: _ChartsScreenState
classes.description: Loads analytics data and renders pie chart visualization.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds UI for each widget, managing layout and theme.

methods.name: _checkAuth
methods.description: Checks user authentication status on startup.

methods.name: _onAuthenticated
methods.description: Callback on successful login to refresh auth state.

methods.name: _onSwitchToRegister
methods.description: Switches login view to registration view.

methods.name: _onSwitchToLogin
methods.description: Switches registration view to login view.

methods.name: _onLogout
methods.description: Logs out user and resets auth state.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Saves or updates transaction based on form data.
